Taught by industry-aligned, full-time faculty, Galvanize’s 24-week in-person immersive program is an intense, hands-on coding and interactive classroom instruction, based upon the foundation of computer science theory, statistics, and software engineering. Successfully completed the program on the Phoenix campus in July of 2017.
Web Development immersive program requires students to learn new technologies roughly every five weeks to adapt to the changing needs of the technology industry.

recommendations: Managing Lead Instructor at Galvanize Inc
October 6, 2017, Nmuta Timothy was Satoshi’s teacher

Satoshi is one of the most engaging and personable students I've ever worked with. He's hard on himself, but he writes really clean, understandable code, has a great work ethic, is self motivated , disciplined, and has a high standard of personal excellence. In addition to all of those things, his quarter 1, 2, and 3 projects and his capstone project all reflected a great attention to visual detail.  He also chose projects that required a good deal of logic / programming skill on the back end. Lastly, Satoshi's ability to present and his sense of humor in a group setting was unparalleled in his class.  Some of the humor and satire in his presentations are things that I still laugh about in retrospect when reflecting on his presentation.  English being his second language, he has a better sense of humor in English than most people who are native speakers. I highly recommend Satoshi; I would hire him myself if given the opportunity.

summary: ** I do not require a visa. I am a permanent resident. **I filled several roles throughout the nine years I spent in the semiconductor industry, adapting to new business needs as they emerged. During this time, I had several opportunities to work on software problems. These experiences made me realize that I wanted to be the one creating code. As a result, I spent six months at Galvanize, a web-development school, learning how to be a full-stack software engineer. I hope to work for an employer who values versatility, learning, and constant growth.
name: Satoshi Tokuno
title: Recent graduate Full-stack Web developer at Galvanize, Inc / Software Engineer
